#summary This page provides a listing of Use Cases for the COLORE System.

= COLORE System Use Cases =

  * [Uc1CreateNewClText Create a new CL text]
  * [Uc1RetrieveListingOfAllClTexts Retrieve a listing of all CL texts]
  * [Uc1DeleteAllVersionsOfClText Delete all versions of a CL text]
  * [Uc1DeleteVersionOfClText Delete a version of a CL text]
  * [Uc1DeleteMostRecentVersionOfClText Delete the most recent version of a CL text]
